question: A manifesto known as “Philosophy of the Bomb”, was brought out by which among the following organizations?
explanation: Hindustan Republican Association (HRA) was established in the year 1924. The founding members of the organizatio were Ram Prasad Bismil, Sachindra Nath Sanyal, Dr. Jadugopal Mukherjee. Later it became Hindustan Socialist Republican Association in 1928. Chandra Sekhar Azad was an Indian revolutionary leader who organised the Hindustan Socialist Republican Association (HSRA) in 1924. He died on 27 February 1931 at Azad Park in Allahabad while fighting with the police.
